data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miller, Jeremy A., Griswold, Charles E., Scharff, Nikolaj, Řezac, Milan, Szűts, Tamas, Marhabaie, Mohammad (2012): The velvet spiders: an atlas of the Eresidae (Arachnida, Araneae). ZooKeys 195: 1-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.195.2342, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.195.2342
